Article Title: Aaron Rodgers' uncertain future: A strategic holdout or running out of options?
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers (via: Getty Images)

Rodgers playing the waiting game: Patience or lack of interest?



All Signs Seem To Be Leading To Aaron Rodgers Being A Steeler... So Why Are We Waiting? | Pat McAfee

Rodgers‚Äô retirement still looming?



The NFL offseason is buzzing with speculation, and one of the biggest storylines centers around Aaron Rodgers . Once the face of the Green Bay Packers and, more recently, a brief but injury-plagued experiment with the New York Jets, Rodgers now finds himself without a team. But is the veteran quarterback biding his time for the right opportunity, or is he running out of viable options?Rodgers has never been one to rush decisions, and his current free agency saga reflects that. With the New York Giants opting for Russell Wilson and the Minnesota Vikings locking in their future with rookie J.J. McCarthy, his options appear slim. The Pittsburgh Steelers remain a possible landing spot, but sources indicate Rodgers is hesitant to commit.While Pittsburgh offers a competitive roster and a strong defense, reports suggest Rodgers may not be fully sold on the fit. His recent throwing session with new Steelers wideout DK Metcalf raised eyebrows, but a contract hasn‚Äôt followed, leading to speculation that he may have ulterior motives.One prevailing theory is that Rodgers is playing the long game. Injuries are inevitable in the NFL, and quarterback vacancies could arise before the season kicks off. By staying patient, Rodgers might be positioning himself for a better opportunity‚Äîone where he can step into a playoff-ready team rather than forcing a fit with a Steelers squad still finding its offensive identity.Minnesota remains a wildcard in this equation. If McCarthy struggles early in training camp or preseason, the Vikings could feel pressure to bring in a proven veteran. Some insiders believe Rodgers is stalling to keep that door open, even if Minnesota has publicly committed to its young quarterback.Then there‚Äôs the possibility that Rodgers simply walks away. At 41, he has nothing left to prove. His legacy as a Super Bowl champion and multiple-time MVP is secure. With media and business opportunities awaiting him off the field, he may decide the right situation isn‚Äôt worth the wait.Also Read: NFL eyes Middle East: Could UAE host a game soon? For now, Rodgers remains the biggest name on the market, but whether he‚Äôs holding out for a dream scenario or facing a harsh reality, time will soon force his hand. If the right team doesn‚Äôt emerge, will he take what‚Äôs available, or will we have seen the last of Aaron Rodgers on an NFL field?
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers is currently without a team after being released by the green bay packers. The pittsburgh steelers remain a possible landing spot, but sources indicate rodgers is hesitant to commit. Some insiders believe rodgers is stalling to keep that door open, even if minnesota has publicly committed to its young quarterback.

Article Title: NBA Record: Golden State Warriors' Stephen Curry becomes the oldest player to achieve this stat; rubs shoulders with Michael Jordan, defying age and gravity
Article Text:
Stephen Curry, at 37, has revitalized the Golden State Warriors, averaging 23.8 points per game in March and setting significant records. The trade for Heat's Jimmy Butler bolstered the team, making them playoff contenders. As they push for a favorable playoff seed, Curry's form will be crucial for their success.

Golden State Warriors

Stephen Curry

Stephen Curry‚Äôs historic scoring feat for the Warriors

Jimmy Butler‚Äôs arrival revitalizes Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors

Playoff push underway for the Golden State Warriors

Why this matters:

Stephen Curry sets another record against the Memphis Grizzlies

Thehave surged toward the NBA playoffs andhas been at the heart of their resurgence. After showing signs of decline earlier in the season, Curry has rediscovered his form, making history in the process.At 37 years old, Curry finished March averaging 23.8 points per game, becoming the oldest guard to average 20+ points in a calendar month since Michael Jordan . He also set another record as the oldest point guard in NBA history to achieve this for an entire month.Key stats from Curry‚Äôs recent performances:- February average: 30.7 points per game- March average: 23.8 points per game- Age: 37 (as of March 14)This level of production is rare for a player in their 16th NBA season, underscoring Curry‚Äôs enduring impact.Before Jimmy Butler joined the team, Curry‚Äôs numbers were below his career averages, and the Golden State Warriors appeared to be fading. The trade has injected new energy into both Curry and the franchise, positioning them as potential playoff contenders.Curry showed his tenacity by returning to activity in spite of recent setbacks, such as exhaustion and a pelvic ailment that kept him out of action for a while. Curry took a short break after coach Steve Kerr recognized his fatigue, but the standout player has already recovered.The Warriors currently sit in sixth place in the Western Conference with a 43-31 record. A win against the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday would propel them into fifth place, tightening their grip on a favorable playoff position.- Playoff seeding is critical for avoiding a tough first-round matchup.- Curry‚Äôs health and form will dictate how far the Warriors can go.- Butler‚Äôs presence has alleviated pressure on Curry, allowing him to thrive.As the regular season winds down, all eyes remain on Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors to see if their late-season surge translates into postseason success.Also read: Luka Doncic sets new Los Angeles Lakers record after blockbuster win over Houston Rockets On April 1, 2025, Stephen Curry added another milestone to his illustrious career by becoming the oldest player in NBA history to record 52 points, 10 rebounds, and 8 assists during the Golden State Warriors‚Äô game against the Memphis Grizzlies. At 36 years old, Curry‚Äôs performance not only highlighted his enduring dominance but also reinforced his status as one of basketball‚Äôs all-time greats.
Article Summary: Stephen curry, at 37, has revitalized the golden state warriors, averaging 23.8 points per game in march. The trade for heat's jimmy butler bolstered the team, making them playoff contenders. As they push for a favorable playoff seed, curry's form will be crucial for their success.

Article Title: Travis Kelce‚Äôs struggles in 2024: Why he blames the Taylor Swift spotlight for his Chiefs' decline
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Travis Kelce‚Äôs 2024 stats take a dive, and fans speculate the reason

Did Taylor Swift‚Äôs global fame add unwanted pressure?



Travis Kelce addresses the slump but remains determined for 2025



Can Travis Kelce bounce back, or is retirement looming?

Kansas City Chiefs ' superstar tight end Travis Kelce had a rough 2024 season, and he's not shying away from discussing what may have played a role in his dip in performance. After a career-worst statistical season‚Äîexcluding his rookie year‚ÄîKelce openly reflected on the overwhelming media attention surrounding his relationship with Taylor Swift and how it may have affected his game.For a player who has consistently been among the NFL‚Äôs elite, Kelce‚Äôs 2024 season was a disappointment. Across 17 games, he managed only 823 receiving yards‚Äîfar from his 1,416-yard peak in 2020. The season culminated in a disastrous Super Bowl LIX loss to the Philadelphia Eagles, where Kelce recorded just four catches for 39 yards in a crushing 40-22 defeat.Kelce didn‚Äôt hold back on his self-criticism. ‚ÄúI let my guys down,‚Äù he admitted on his New Heights podcast on March 5, reflecting on his struggles. The frustration even had him considering retirement at age 35, a thought he openly shared with fans.Kelce‚Äôs relationship with Swift, which took off in 2023, brought unparalleled global attention. From high-profile Eras Tour cameos to lyrical nods in Swift‚Äôs music, their romance became a pop culture phenomenon. But with fame came distractions. ‚ÄúSo much attention on their relationship is not the best thing,‚Äù a source told US Weekly, revealing that the couple dialed back public displays of affection following the Super Bowl loss.Fans on social media were quick to speculate, with some blaming Swift‚Äôs global influence for Kelce‚Äôs decline. ‚ÄúSwift‚Äôs fame threw him off!‚Äù one user posted, pointing out how Kelce‚Äôs numbers dipped significantly compared to previous seasons. A romantic getaway to New Orleans with Patrick and Brittany Mahomes just two days before the Super Bowl also sparked debates, with critics questioning if the distractions were affecting the Chiefs' focus.Despite the speculation, Kelce acknowledges that 2024 was not his best season but stops short of blaming his relationship for his struggles. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think it was my best outing,‚Äù he admitted on New Heights, recalling how he felt ‚Äúanonymous‚Äù in the Super Bowl matchup against the Eagles.After the disappointing loss, Kelce and Swift retreated from the spotlight, spending time together away from the public eye. ‚ÄúJust doing nothing at all has been a dream of theirs,‚Äù a US Weekly source shared, emphasizing the couple‚Äôs desire for normalcy amid the chaos of fame.Kelce has committed to returning for the 2025 season, promising fans on The Pat McAfee Show on February 27 that he‚Äôs ready to ‚Äúget back to the mountaintop‚Äù and erase the ‚Äúbad taste‚Äù left by 2024. While some fans believe Swift‚Äôs orbit impacted his three-touchdown slump, others argue that age and the physical toll of the game played a bigger role.‚ÄúI still love playing,‚Äù Kelce assured fans. However, the lingering retirement whispers suggest that if another season of struggles follows, the Chiefs legend may have a difficult decision to make. One thing is certain: whether Swift‚Äôs influence is a factor or not, all eyes will be on Kelce in 2025 to see if he can reclaim his dominance on the field.Also Read: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce celebrate baby news as wedding rumors continue to swirl
Article Summary: Travis kelce had a career-worst statistical season in 2024. The kansas city chiefs tight end recorded just 823 receiving yards across 17 games. Kelce openly reflected on the overwhelming media attention surrounding his relationship with taylor swift. The couple dialed back public displays of affection following the super bowl loss.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe‚Äôll get crushed‚Äù ‚Äî Former NBA star Tracy McGrady claims LeBron James would lose in a one-on-one matchup against today's players
Article Text:
LeBron James and Tracy McGrady. Image via: David Berding | Getty Images

Tracy McGrady says modern NBA stars will crush LeBron James in one-on-one



TRACY MCGRADY INVITED US TO HIS HOUSE! | The Makeshift Podcast 125

Former NBA star Tracy McGrady has recently claimed that LeBron James would not stand a chance in a one-on-one game with modern stars in the league. Of course, McGrady acknowledged James‚Äô legendary resume in the league and his legacy-enriched records that put him in the GOAT (greatest of all time) debate among fans alongside Michael Jordan . McGrady‚Äôs statement on James has sparked a swift online buzz among fans.LeBron James‚Äô stunning NBA career has been a subject of discussion for more than a decade. In his recent appearance in the Makeshift Project, Tracy McGrady shared an explosive remark on James.‚ÄúI think LeBron has been amazing for 22 freaking years. And he‚Äôs been the best basketball player for, you know, God knows how long. But if you put him in one-on-one? I think he‚Äôll get crushed. Yeah, I think he‚Äôll get crushed ‚Äî amongst guys that are actually in the NBA. And I‚Äôm sure LeBron would tell you that. Because his game is naturally built for five-on-five. He‚Äôs not a one-on-one basketball player. Kobe is a one-on-one basketball player. Kyrie is a one-on-one basketball player. James Harden ‚Äî these guys are one-on-one basketball players. And LeBron can‚Äôt do anything with that,‚Äù McGrady said.When he was asked about the GOAT debate , ‚ÄúTracy McGrady who is the greatest basketball player of all time LeBron James or Michael Jordan or are you?‚Äù McGrady replied instantly, ‚ÄúI'm tired of this question, man. I hope we just dead this question.‚ÄùHe started off acknowledging James‚Äô dominance in the court. ‚ÄúWhat I'm witnessing now and by any means this doesn't make him the greatest player to me but what I am witnessing with my own eyes is watching a 40 year old man do on the basketball court, is the greatest thing I ever seen in sports. I would say that it is the greatest thing my eyes have seen in sports for a 40 year old guy to do what he's doing at that level and to do that consistently every single night.‚ÄùMcGrady further compared his age with James, acknowledging the physical demand to go through such athletic prowess, ‚ÄúI'm 45 and I know what it takes to put your body through that right every single day and he's been doing that for what his 22nd year.‚ÄùWhen it comes to taking sides in the GOAT debate, McGrady said, ‚ÄúI don't care about who's the greatest more I really don't I don't care I don't care about it MJ had a phenomenal career, LeBron has had a phenomenal career, you know? All those guys had freaking phenomenal careers like they can be in a room having a discussion with one another and talking trash that's really that I mean. Really doesn't matter like they all in the same room.‚ÄùAlso Read: " Celebrating a man landing on the ground?": LeBron James' one-legged shot against Houston Rockets sparks mixed reactions from fans Regardless, James is still playing at an elite level, averaging 24.4 points per game, 8.1 rebounds, and 8.4 assists.
Article Summary: Tracy mcgrady says modern nba stars will crush lebron james in one-on-one game. Mcgrady‚Äôs statement on james has sparked a swift online buzz among fans. James is still playing at an elite level, averaging 24.4 points per game.

Article Title: Letsile Tebogo, who beat Noah Lyles for Olympic gold medal, says: 'I'd be a criminal by now without sports'
Article Text:
Olympic medallist Letsile Tebogo (AFP Photo)

NEW DELHI: Letsile Tebogo , the Olympic 200m champion from Botswana, shared his inspiring journey and the pivotal role athletics played in keeping him away from delinquency.Growing up in a neighborhood plagued by criminal activities, Tebogo acknowledged that without the focus provided by sports, he could have easily fallen into the wrong path."Sport has really helped me a lot because I think without sport ... probably I would be a criminal by now," 21-year-old Tebogo said. "In the neighbourhood where I grew up there were a lot of criminals, it was the only way to survive. But then with sport I knew I had to go to school and with training you are tired. You don't have time to roam the streets and go into people's houses.""So once I discovered that I tried to pull in a few friends of mine ... and now they are playing football," he added. "We always talk about if this didn't work out, where would we be?"Tebogo credited athletics for giving him a purpose and keeping him occupied, preventing him from roaming the streets and engaging in unlawful activities.He even encouraged his friends to take up sports like football, recognising the positive impact it had on their lives."I was more of a footballer, a left-winger. The teachers at my primary school forced me into athletics. (Athletics) wasn't that popular in Botswana back then, until the Commonwealth Games 2018. From my side I just wanted to see where it would take me. Athletics was just a part-time thing for me," he added.Despite athletics not being popular in Botswana at the time, Tebogo's switch to the sport paid off handsomely when he beat legendary Noah Lyles to clinch the gold medal in the 200m event at the 2024 Paris Olympics , setting an African record of 19.46 seconds.While Tebogo clarified his previous comments about Noah Lyles' "arrogance," stating that it's all business on the track."When you get onto the track, it's all about business," he added. "When we finish, you can be friends, life goes on. But the 'arrogance' (of Lyles)... he is good to sell our sport. But with me, I'll always shy away from doing that because that's me."As he prepares for the upcoming Diamond League meetings and the World Championships in Tokyo, Tebogo expects fierce competition from his rivals."Everybody who's there on the lineup, it's a rival. You cannot eliminate somebody because he didn't perform well at the 2024 Olympics or 2023 World Championships," he concluded.Tebogo had also set a new U20 world record for 100m, clocking 9.96 seconds at the Gaborone International Meet in 2022.
Article Summary: Olympic 200m champion letsile tebogo talks about his inspiring journey. The 21-year-old credits athletics for keeping him away from delinquency. Tebogo won gold in the 200m event at the 2024 paris olympics. He also set an african record of 19.46 seconds.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Paulina Gretzky turns heads in new pictures from her luxurious vacation while her father faces heat over Team USA support
Article Text:
Image via Ryan Remiorz/CP

Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter, Paulina Gretzky, posts a stunning picture from the luxurious trip she took with her close friends



Wayne Gretzky, the NHL legend, has been going through a tough time ever since fans have brutally slammed him as he was accused of supporting the opposing team at the 4 Nations Face Off ‚Äôs final match. His children have mostly kept themselves out of this mess and only his wife, former actress Janet Jones, has defended him in public. Recently, Wayne Gretzky and Janet Jones‚Äô elder daughter, Paulina Gretzky, took to her Instagram to share new pictures from a recent luxurious vacation.In the past week, Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs older daughter, Paulina Gretzky, had taken a trip to the St. Barts to celebrate her friend‚Äôs bachelorette trip. Now, Paulina Gretzky has posted stunning pictures of hers from the trip.Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter, Paulina Gretzky, posted several pictures from her trip. One of the pictures has her and all her close friends dressed in sparkly dresses as they all posed together. Another picture shows Paulina Gretzky and her friends posing on their private airplane that they took to the Carribean island.A third picture shows all the women posing in red coloured dresses while the bride to be and her fiance are dressed in white.Paulina Gretzky also shared a stunning picture of hers as she posed in a light green coloured sparkly coord set.Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs daughter opted for a light green coloured crop top that she paired with a mini skirt of the same colour. Paulina Gretzky kept her hair open and also carried a similar coloured bag from a luxurious brand.Paulina Gretzky kept her hair open as she opted for heels of a similar colour and silver jewellery to go with the whole look.Paulina Gretzky, along with her two siblings, have kept themselves completely away from the controversy at the 4 Nations Face Off‚Äôs final match between Team Canada and Team USA.It was reported that Wayne Gretzky was supporting Team USA since he was not spotted wearing the Canadian jersey that he should have worn because he was the honorary captain. Apparently, the NHL legend was also spotted showing a thumbs up to Team USA, making things worse for him. A statement from Wayne Gretzky is awaited by fans.Also Read: Auston Matthews‚Äô drop in performance could be linked to fatigue NHL expert speculates
Article Summary: Wayne gretzky and janet jones‚Äô elder daughter, paulina, took to her instagram to share new pictures from a recent luxurious vacation. The nhl legend has been going through a tough time ever since fans have brutally slammed him as he was accused of supporting the opposing team at the 4 nations face off ‚Äôs final match.

Article Title: Will Alex Bregman play today against Baltimore Orioles? Latest update on Boston Red Sox star's injury report (April 3, 2025)
Article Text:
Will Alex Bregman play today against Baltimore Orioles? Latest update on Boston Red Sox star's injury report (Image Source: Getty)

The Boston Red Sox reveals the game status of Alex Bregman: Will the star play today against the Baltimore Orioles

Are star players sidelined? Baltimore Orioles‚Äô team injury report you can‚Äôt miss

The match for 3rd April 2025 is set to begin at 1:05 p.m. ET, and the fans are eagerly waiting to give a shoutout to their team. On the other hand, the match will be live on Fubo, which is an online streaming platform.The game between the Boston Red Sox and the Baltimore Orioles will also be live on local television channels, i.e., MASN for people in Baltimore and NESN for people living in Boston. It‚Äôs going to be an amazing match between the major baseball teams, and the fans can‚Äôt wait to see which teams win the game today.Alex Bregman is one of the new players for the Boston Red Sox, and it‚Äôs going to be his debut this season for the team. The deal was finalized between Alex Bregman and the Boston Red Sox, and till now, he is assigned in the lineup for the opening season matches of the team. As per his performance in his last match, he is certainly going to be playing today against the Baltimore Orioles.The Boston Red Sox team has yet to release the official lineup for the match today, but there are negligible chances of keeping Alex Bregman sidelined. On the other hand, there are certain major injury updates from the team. Keeping this in mind, the team included Kristian Campbel along with Sean Newcomb for the rosters in today‚Äôs game.Although there are some players injured in the Baltimore Orioles but it‚Äôs positive news for Gunnar Henderson as he is likely to play in the game today. Further, Grayson Rodriguez was injured in the previous season but gave a fine performance in the match that was held on 2nd April.Other players, such as Andrew Kittredge, Kyle Bradish, and Tyler Wells, are not expected to participate in the league till June. Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, KKR vs SRH: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
Kolkata Knight Riders players after the big win. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Brief Scores:

KKR:

SRH:

NEW DELHI: Venkatesh Iyer smashed a blistering 60 off 29 balls to power Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) to a dominant 80-run victory over Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) at Eden Gardens on Thursday. The win lifted KKR from the bottom of the IPL 2025 table to fifth place, while SRH slumped to last.After being sent in to bat, KKR rode on Iyer‚Äôs explosive knock and his 91-run partnership with Rinku Singh (32 not out) to post 200/6.Iyer, who was bought for Rs 23.75 crore in the November auction, justified his price tag with an innings studded with seven fours and three sixes. Ajinkya Rahane (38) and young Angkrish Raghuvanshi (50) laid a solid foundation with an 81-run stand before Iyer took over, smashing 21 runs in a single over off Pat Cummins.In response, SRH collapsed to 120 all out in 16.4 overs. Vaibhav Arora (3/29) and Varun Chakravarthy (3/22) dismantled the SRH batting, with early wickets leaving them reeling at 9/3.Heinrich Klaasen (33) and Kamindu Mendis (27) tried to fight back, but KKR‚Äôs bowlers ensured there was no comeback.This commanding win gives KKR much-needed momentum, while SRH will have to regroup after yet another disappointing performance.200 for 5 in 20 overs (Venkatesh Iyer 60, Angkrish Raghuvanshi 50; Mohammed Shami 1/29, Kamindu Mendis 1/4).120 all out in 16.4 overs (Heinrich Klaasen 33; Vaibhav Arora 3/29, Varun Chakaravarthy 3/22).
Article Summary: Venkatesh iyer smashed 60 off 29 balls to power kolkata knight riders (kkr) to a dominant 80-run victory over sunrisers hyderabad (srh) at eden gardens on thursday. The win lifted kkr from the bottom of the ipl 2025 table to fifth place, while srh slumped to last.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Kagiso Rabada returns to South Africa due to personal reasons
Article Text:
Gujarat Titans' Kagiso Rabada (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How do you think Gujarat Titans will perform without Kagiso Rabada? They might even improve They will manage fine They will struggle

NEW DELHI: Gujarat Titans (GT) pacer Kagiso Rabada has left the ongoing Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 season and returned home to South Africa for personal reasons, the franchise announced on Thursday. The team did not specify the duration of his absence."Kagiso Rabada has returned to South Africa to deal with an important personal matter," GT said in an official statement.Also See: KKR vs SRH The 29-year-old had played two matches for GT this season, registering figures of 1/41 against Punjab Kings and 1/42 against Mumbai Indians. He was absent from GT‚Äôs recent eight-wicket victory over Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium, with Arshad Khan replacing him and making an immediate impact by dismissing Virat Kohli early.GT had secured Rabada‚Äôs services for Rs 10.75 crore in last year‚Äôs mega auction. In 82 IPL matches, Rabada has claimed 119 wickets at an average of 22.29 and an economy rate of 8.53.GT still has pace options in Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna and Gerald Coetzee . They will next face Sunrisers Hyderabad on Sunday, hoping to extend their winning streak.
Article Summary: Kagiso rabada has left the ongoing indian premier league (ipl) season and returned home to south africa. The 29-year-old had played two matches for gt this season, registering figures of 1/41 against punjab kings and 1/42 against mumbai indians. He was absent from gt‚Äôs recent eight-wicket victory over royal challengers bengaluru.

Article Title: Rohit Sharma: 'Abhi mereko koi karne ki jarurat nahi hai': Rohit Sharma's comment goes viral
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma and Rishabh Pant (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

WATCH:

NEW DELHI: A heartwarming moment between Mumbai Indians ‚Äô former captain Rohit Sharma and Lucknow Super Giants skipper Rishabh Pant stole the spotlight on the eve of their Indian Premier League 2025 clash at the Ekana Cricket Stadium.A video shared by Mumbai Indians on social media showed Pant surprising Rohit by hugging him from behind while he was engaged in a chat with LSG mentor Zaheer Khan.The clip quickly went viral, capturing the camaraderie between the two Indian cricket stars.In the video, Rohit can be heard saying, "Jo karna tha, maine kiya barabar. Abhi mereko koi karne ki jarurat nahi hai," before Pant playfully interrupted him with a cheerful "Haanji!" before embracing him.The lighthearted exchange added a touch of warmth ahead of a crucial fixture for both teams.MI, led by Hardik Pandya , and LSG, under Pant, have had inconsistent starts to the season, winning just one of their three matches. While MI‚Äôs batting struggles and Jasprit Bumrah‚Äôs absence remain concerns, LSG will look to Nicholas Pooran and Mitchell Marsh to continue their good form.With LSG dominating their head-to-head record (5-1), MI will be eager to shift momentum when they face off on Friday.
Article Summary: Rishabh pant surprised rohit sharma by hugging him from behind. The heartwarming moment took place on the eve of their clash at ekana cricket stadium. Mi and lsg have had inconsistent starts to the season, winning just one of their three matches.

Article Title: 'Khudko The Lord bol raha hai': Rohit Sharma's banter with Shardul Thakur delights fans - Watch
Article Text:
Shardul Thakur and Rohit Sharma (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Gully To Glory: Ramandeep Singh's journey from Chandigarh to Team India via KKR

NEW DELHI: On the eve of the IPL 2025 clash between Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) and Mumbai Indians (MI) at the Ekana Cricket Stadium , a lighthearted moment stole the spotlight.MI shared a heartwarming video featuring their former captain Rohit Sharma catching up with LSG's all-rounder Shardul Thakur and mentor Zaheer Khan Also See: IPL Live Score As Rohit walked in, Shardul, known for his playful nature, cheekily declared, "Rohit Sharma ek hi jan ko milne aata hai ground me - The Lord."Rohit, amused, responded with a grin, "Khudko 'The Lord' bol raha hain."Without missing a beat, Shardul quipped, "Aur kya? Tune hi rakha hai naam."Rohit then turned to Zaheer, greeting him with a warm hug, "Mr Khan, how are you man?"The MI-LSG encounter on Friday is a crucial one, with both teams struggling to find consistency after winning just one of their three matches. MI, under Hardik Pandya, have grappled with form issues, particularly in batting. While Ryan Rickelton impressed in their win over KKR, Rohit Sharma's lack of big scores and the absence of Jasprit Bumrah remain concerns.LSG, just below MI in the standings, have relied on Nicholas Pooran's explosive batting, with Mitchell Marsh providing support. Shardul and Ravi Bishnoi, though, will need to step up with the ball.With LSG dominating their head-to-head record (5-1), MI will be eager to turn the tide.
Article Summary: Mi shared a heartwarming video featuring their former captain rohit sharma catching up with lsg's all-rounder shardul thakur and mentor zaheer khan. Mi-lsg encounter on friday is a crucial one, with both teams struggling to find consistency after winning just one of their three matches.

Article Title: IPL 2025: Venkatesh Iyer, Vaibhav Arora heroics lead KKR to dominating 80-run victory over SRH
Article Text:
Venkatesh Iyer and Vaibhav Arora (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Gully To Glory: Ramandeep Singh's journey from Chandigarh to Team India via KKR

NEW DELHI: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) delivered a resounding performance, defeating Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) by 80 runs in the 15th match of IPL 2025 on Thursday at Eden Gardens , Kolkata.The victory was shaped by Venkatesh Iyer ‚Äôs explosive batting and Vaibhav Arora ‚Äôs fiery bowling, both playing key roles in KKR‚Äôs dominance.Batting first, KKR lost early wickets but found stability with a strong middle-order performance.Venkatesh Iyer led the charge with a scintillating 60 off 29 balls, smashing seven fours and three sixes at an incredible strike rate of 206.90.Iyer walked in when KKR was 97/3 in the 11th over, following Ajinkya Rahane‚Äôs dismissal.He quickly turned the momentum in KKR‚Äôs favour, forming a crucial partnership with Angkrish Raghuvanshi (50 off 32).Iyer‚Äôs ability to attack spinners and pacers alike ensured KKR accelerated in the final overs.His innings ended in the 19th over, caught by Aniket Verma off Harshal Patel, but he had already powered KKR to an imposing 200/6 in 20 overs.Defending 200, Vaibhav Arora struck in his very first over, dismissing dangerous Travis Head.He continued his lethal spell, removing Ishan Kishan (2) and Heinrich Klaasen (33), breaking SRH‚Äôs resistance. His figures of 3/29 put KKR in complete control. He later went on to win the Player of the Match award.SRH crumbled under KKR‚Äôs bowling pressure, getting bowled out for 120 in 16.4 overs.Apart from Klaasen (33) and Kamindu Mendis (27), no batter could make a significant impact. Harshit Rana, Varun Chakaravarthy, Sunil Narine, and Andre Russell provided crucial breakthroughs to complement Arora‚Äôs brilliance.KKR‚Äôs commanding victory was powered by Venky Iyer‚Äôs attacking knock and Vaibhav Arora‚Äôs match-winning spell, ensuring their team‚Äôs dominance in IPL 2025.
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders (kkr) defeated sunrisers hyderabad (srh) by 80 runs in the 15th match of ipl 2025 on thursday at eden gardens, kolkata. Venkatesh iyer led the charge with a scintillating 60 off 29 balls, smashing seven fours and three sixes at an incredible strike rate of 206.90.

Article Title: Brad Marchand and Tony DeAngelo‚Äôs controversial old video resurfaces and fans are losing it over the exchange
Article Text:
Image via Sergei Belski-Imagn Images

Brad Marchand and Tony DeAngelo‚Äôs old video resurfaces and fans are losing their minds over it



Brad Marchand spent sixteen years playing for the Boston Bruins and last month he left the team as he was traded to the Florida Panthers. Recently, the star player played his first match for the Florida Panthers and proved his worth on the ice. But an old video of Brad Marchand has now resurfaced and fans are busy appreciating Brad Marchand again.The old video that has now resurfaced is actually from a controversial incident in 2022 when Brad Marchand and Tony DeAngelo got into an argument with each other.The controversy happened at a match between the Boston Bruins and the Carolina Hurricanes when a video went viral where fans believed that Brad Marchand called Tony DeAngelo ‚Äúa racist‚Äù.Fans believe Brad Marchand said, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre a f***ing racist‚Äù, even though there has been no confirmation on this.The reason fans believe that Tony DeAngelo was called a racist was because of his history in the OHL. The star player has been suspended twice in the OHL for violating policies related to "homophobic, racist, and sexist language‚Äù.However, Brad Marchand never spoke of it in public. As he spoke to the media after the game, as per NESN, Brad Marchand "It wasn‚Äôt much of an exchange. I didn‚Äôt even know he was around me. Kind of came out of nowhere. There really wasn‚Äôt much of one. Just saying, ‚ÄòHey, how‚Äôs your Mother‚Äôs Day?‚ÄùNow, this old video of Brad Marchand and Tony DeAngelo has resurfaced and fans are here for it.A fan commented, ‚ÄúUnfortunately ‚Äúyea well you‚Äôre a f**king racist‚Äù is in fact the greatest chirp of all time‚Äù, while another fan joked, ‚ÄúWas gonna say that's my captain but he's not anymore üíî‚ÄùA third fan wrote, ‚Äúi need to be a fly in that panthers locker room‚Äù, while another user commented, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a Marchand stan now I cannot deny it anymore‚Äù.A fifth fan noted, ‚ÄúüôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è you‚Äôre a racist üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è you‚Äôre a RACIST‚Ä¶he made sureeeeee he heard him‚Äù.Brad Marchand‚Äôs new team, the Florida Panthers, recently lost to the Toronto Maple Leafs and are now gearing up to face the Ottawa Senators.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Paulina Gretzky flaunts her luxurious vacation amid NHL legend's silence on recent trolling
Article Summary: Brad marchand and tony deangelo‚Äôs old video resurfaces and fans are losing their minds over it. The old video that has now resurfaced is actually from a controversial incident in 2022. The controversy happened at a match between the boston bruins and the carolina hurricanes when a video went viral.

Dodgers two-way star Shohei Ohtani‚Äôs recent feat leads the franchise to a new record

The Dodgers created a new record with their unbroken winning feat against the Atlanta Braves during the 2025 MLB season. The two-way superstar Shohei Ohtani stole the spotlight with his widely talked about walk-off home run, which accelerated the Los Angeles Dodgers to dominate the Braves with a lead of 8-0. The Dodgers went on to become the first MLB team to open a season with a winning streak.The Shohei Ohtani and team‚Äôs actions and intent speak volumes about their mindset for the 2025 MLB season. With their recent unbeaten streak against the Atlanta Braves, the Los Angeles Dodgers made headlines across the globe. The icing on the cake was the walk-off home run by the Dodgers‚Äô designated hitter, Shohei Ohtani, on his bobblehead night.During the post-game interview, Shohei Ohtani spoke about his bobblehead night and even gave the much-needed credit to the Dodgers‚Äô infielder Max Muncy . He said via interpreter Will Ireton-While talking about Max Muncy, Ohtani said-However, the embarrassing loss against the Dodgers has brought the entire team of the Atlanta Braves under the scanner, with the cracks and loopholes in the roster visible from left, right, and center. The bad start to the Atlanta Braves has left an uncertain trajectory with respect to the ongoing MLB season‚Äôs playoffs. With Shohei Ohtani and other Dodgers‚Äô stars blasting the Braves athletes and restricting them on the field, not much can be predicted for the Atlanta Braves.Read Also: Jack Flaherty reunites with former teammates during Dodgers ring distribution ceremony

Article Title: Who is Carlos Correa's wife Daniella Rodriguez? Everything in Miss Texas USA pageant
Article Text:
Who is Carlos Correa's wife Daniella Rodriguez? Everything about Miss Texas USA pageant (Image Source: Getty)

Daniella Rodriguez winning hearts and pageants since teenage years

Daniella Rodriguez meeting Carlos Correa on the field

Carlos Correa proposing Daniella Rodriguez on the pitch

Daniella Rodriguez‚Äôs academics, career and achievements

The Minnesota Twins‚Äô shortstop Carlos Correa and wife Daniella Rodriguez share a relationship that is well-known to the public eye. From meeting for the first time on the field to getting a public proposal after winning the World Series, the couple has never shied away from showing love towards each other.But, the real question is: Who is Daniella Rodriguez? What does the former Miss Texas do for a living? We have the details here.Daniella Rodriguez has always been in the highlight long before she met the Minnesota Twins‚Äô shortstop. Back in 2013, Rodriguez won her first pageant, Miss Texas Teen at the mere age of 17. In 2016, Rodriguez bagged the title of Miss Texas USA when she was just 19.She is well known for her wit and smart answers, for which she was crowned as Miss Texas USA. The Mexican beauty also competed for the Miss USA title in 2016, and fell short from winning it.Though Daniella was unable to win the Miss USA crown, she did catch the shortstop‚Äôs heart. In 2016, the couple first met when the pageant queen was invited to throw her first pitch in a Houston Astros game. At that time, Correa was still with the Astros.Though Daniella couldn‚Äôt throw well, for which fans made fun of her for a couple of months, Correa gave his heart away to the beauty queen.They hit it off-field and made their relationship public by posting a picture together while attending a Kanye West concert on October 2016.Life came full circle when a year later, Carlos Correa proposed to Daniella Rodriguez on the same baseball ground where they first met. When the Astros won the World Series title, he wasted no time and pulled out a ring during the live telecast.‚ÄúI‚Äôm about to take another big step in my life‚Äù said Correa before popping the question to Rodriguez. The former pageant queen said yes, and the couple had a courthouse ceremony on November 11, 2019, followed by a beachside wedding in Punta Cana on December 7, 2019.The couple welcomed their first son, Kylo Daniel, in November 2019, and had their second child, Kenzo, in March 2023.Apart from being a pageant queen, Daniella Rodriguez also has several achievements to her name. In 2021, Rodriguez founded her own cosmetic company, Sweet D, which sells cruelty-free, paraben-free, vegan cosmetic products.Rodriguez also has a passion for teaching for which she earned a degree in teaching and early childhood development from Texas A&M University. She also has a YouTube channel under her name where she used to post vlogs on her daily life, with Correa making regular cameos. However, the channel has been inactive since 2019.Currently, Rodriguez enjoys a loving family life with her husband Carlos Correa, their two sons, and dogs, while managing her cosmetic company.Also read: Twins star Carlos Correa expressed gratitude to wife Daniella by sporting personalized gloves on field.
Article Summary: Carlos correa proposed to daniella rodriguez on the same baseball ground where they first met. The couple welcomed their first son, kylo daniel, in november 2019, and had their second child, kenzo, in march 2023. Rodriguez also has a passion for teaching for which she earned a degree in teaching and early childhood development from texas a&m university.

Article Title: IPL 2025, LSG vs MI: Struggling Rohit Sharma, Rishabh Pant face the music
Article Text:
Rishabh Pant and Rohit Sharma (AP/Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

LUCKNOW: Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) skipper Rishabh Pant and Mumbai Indians (MI) star Rohit Sharma will be under the scanner due to poor form when these two teams face off at the Ekana Stadium here on Friday.The lean patch of the two stalwarts has put more pressure on their respective teams, both of which have blown hot and cold and not really built any sort of winning momentum so far.LSG lost their first home game to Punjab Kings by eight wickets, being outplayed in all departments, while five-time champions Mumbai Indians have not really clicked so far this season, with just two points from three games.MI and LSG are sixth and seventh respectively on the points table, though Friday‚Äôs tie puts more pressure on Lucknow since it is another ‚Äòhome‚Äô game, even though any sort of help from the surface hasn‚Äôt been forthcoming yet, leading to controversy.MI, meanwhile, beat Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) in their own backyard and will be relatively upbeat. It‚Äôs Rohit‚Äôs lack of runs at the top of the order, though, that may have them in a quandary.The former MI skipper seems reluctant to give himself any sort of time to gauge the surface or settle in, which has invariably led to the fall of an early wicket. Meanwhile, Pant, the costliest player in IPL history, has just 17 runs from three matches.Pant will be concerned about the runs not flowing from his blade ahead of a busy season. He has scores of 0, 15 and 2 in the three games so far and the ‚Äòhoneymoon period‚Äô with a new franchise may soon run out.The good news for the LSG skipper is that the team's depleted pace attack now wears a much-improved look with Avesh Khan joining the team against SRH and Akash Deep slated to play Friday‚Äôs game.The prospect of some explosive batting from Nicholas Pooran (LSG) and Suryakumar Yadav (MI), though, will please the fans.
Article Summary: Lsg lost their first home game to punjab kings by eight wickets. Mi, meanwhile, beat kolkata knight riders (kkr) in their own backyard. Rohit‚Äôs lack of runs at the top of the order, though, may have them in a quandary.

Article Title: LeBron James faces social media backlash over pregame outfit ahead of crucial Lakers-Warriors clash - "Farmer Bron with his hoodie on!"

LeBron James. Image via: Ryan Sun/ AP

LeBron‚Äôs on-court focus outweighs fashion criticism

Hours before the Los Angeles Lakers faced the Golden State Warriors in a pivotal regular-season matchup, LeBron James turned heads with his unconventional pregame outfit. The NBA legend arrived at Crypto.com Arena wearing distressed denim overalls featuring the word "AKRON" in prominent lettering, paying homage to his hometown.James paired the overalls with a black hoodie, dark sunglasses, and black sneakers. While the 40-year-old seemed confident in his fashion choice, social media users quickly voiced their disapproval, sparking a wave of humorous and critical reactions.Fans on X (formerly Twitter) didn‚Äôt hold back in their assessment of James‚Äô outfit. The general consensus leaned heavily toward disapproval, with many calling the look a fashion misfire.Key reactions included:Despite the online roasting, James has never been one to let outside criticism affect his performance.The matchup between the Lakers and Warriors carried significant weight in the Western Conference standings .With only seven games left in the regular season, the Lakers held a two-game lead over the Warriors. A win for Golden State would tighten the race for playoff positioning, while a Lakers victory would strengthen their hold on a top-three seed.While James‚Äô outfit became an unexpected talking point, his performance on the court mattered far more. As the NBA‚Äôs all-time leading scorer and a four-time champion, he has consistently proven his ability to rise above distractions.Given his track record, the social media roasting was unlikely to faze him. Instead, his priority remained securing a crucial win for the Lakers as they push for a strong playoff position.Also read: Los Angeles Lakers vs Golden State Warriors prediction (April 3, 2025): Playoff preview with key odds, spread, best picks, and more Fashion critiques aside, James‚Äô legacy is built on basketball excellence‚Äînot wardrobe choices. And with the postseason approaching, his play, not his pregame attire, will ultimately define his impact.
Article Summary: Lebron james wore distressed denim overalls with the word "akron" in prominent lettering. Social media users quickly voiced their disapproval, sparking a wave of humorous and critical reactions. Despite the online roasting, james has never been one to let outside criticism affect his performance.

Article Title: Giannis Antetokounmpo creates never-before-seen record during Philadelphia 76ers vs Milwaukee Bucks game
Article Text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo. Image via: Jesse D. Garrabrant / National Basketball Association / Getty Images

Giannis Antetokounmpo creates history with an impressive stat line



Giannis Antetokounmpo delivered a performance for the record books‚Äî again. During the Philadelphia 76ers vs Milwaukee Bucks game, Antetokounmpo created discussion among fans with his stunning performance.In Thursday‚Äôs 126-113 victory over the short-handed Philadelphia 76ers, Giannis became the first player in NBA history to record at least 35 points, 20 assists, and 15 rebounds in a single game.Giannis Antetokounmpo delivered one of the most complete stat lines of the season during his historic night against the Philadelphia 76ers. In just under 39 minutes on the floor, the Bucks‚Äô forward racked up 35 points while shooting an efficient 63.2% from the field, going 12-of-19 and even hitting his only 3-point attempt.He also converted 10 of his 11 free throws. Antetokounmpo was dominant on the glass as well, pulling down 17 total rebounds while dishing out a career-high 20 assists. He contributed 2 steals and managed to stay out of foul trouble with zero personal fouls.Antetokounmpo turned the ball over just twice and finished with a game-high plus-minus of +23. Tonight‚Äôs record at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia made him the first NBA player to achieve the record.The 76ers, playing without their top starters, had no answers. At one point, they led the game, but the Bucks stormed back behind their superstar‚Äôs all-around brilliance. Giannis effectively carried the offense on a night when All-Star guard Damian Lillard was still sidelined due to deep vein thrombosis.Giannis currently leads the league in both made field goals and free throws attempted per game.Brook Lopez added 17 points, Kyle Kuzma contributed 16, and sharpshooter AJ Green knocked down four triples for 12 points. The night wasn‚Äôt without drama on the bench either, as Bucks head coach Doc Rivers exited mid-game due to illness, leaving assistant Darvin Ham to take the reins.Despite the loss, the 76ers had a few bright spots. Rookie Adem Bona was impressive with a career-high 28 points on 13-for-15 shooting. Quentin Grimes chipped in 24 points and 10 assists, while Guerschon Yabusele added 22.Also Read: "I don't like comparing eras": Giannis Antetokounmpo shuts down LeBron James' wild 250-point claim Antetokounmpo already has several accolades to his name, including 1 NBA Championship, 2 NBA MVP awards, 1 Finals MVP, and 1 Defensive Player of the Year. The Greek Freak also has 9 All-Star selections to his credit.
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo is the first player in nba history to record at least 35 points, 20 assists, and 15 rebounds in a single game. In just under 39 minutes on the floor, the bucks‚Äô forward racked up 35 points while shooting an efficient 63.2% from the field. The 76ers, playing without their top starters, had no answers.
